name: PISTA GP RR E2206 DOT - SOLELUNA 2022
description: The most advanced racing helmet in the world worn by Valentino Rossi in the 2022 season, in a limited edition.

name: PISTA GP RR E2206 DOT - MONO IRIDIUM CARBON
description: The 100% carbon-fiber racing helmet used by MotoGP™ riders.

name: PISTA GP RR E2206 DOT - FUTURO CARBONIO FORGIATO
description: Special edition of the racing helmet used in MotoGP™ with shell and PRO Spoiler made of exclusive Carbonio Forgiato, visor and details in Elettro Iridium blue. Design: FUTURO CARBONIO FORGIATO/ELETTRO IRIDIUM

name: K-5 JET E2205 MONO - NARDO GREY
description: AGV K-5 JET E2205 motorcycle helmet. This Maxi-jet is beautifully streamlined for both touring and urban use.

name: COMPACT ST E2205 MONO - WHITE
description: AGV COMPACT ST E2205 motorcycle helmet. A versatile, modular helmet homologated in two different configurations, with a new interior for maximum comfort.

name: TOURMODULAR E2206 - TEXTOUR MATT BLACK/GREY
description: Lightweight, comfortable and ultra-protective modular helmet, set up for use with integrated DMC communication system. Designed for maximum comfort and safety on long trips.

name: K6 S E2206 - NARDO GREY
description: The lightest road helmet in the world, versatile and suitable for every motorcycle rider, designed with technologies developed for professional MotoGP™ riders.

name: K3 E2206 - FORTIFY GREY/BLACK/YELLOW FLUO
description: The iconic AGV full-face road helmet, versatile and safe, suited to any riding style, with built-in sun visor.

name: K1 S E2206 - DREAMTIME
description: The sporty road helmet for every day, with Aero Spoiler and Ultravision visor.

name: AX9 AGV E2205 MULTI MPLK - STEPPA CARBON/GREY/YELLOW FLUO
description: Lightness, comfort and adaptability reach the highest technological level in the AGV AX9.

name: AX9 MULTI E2205 - NORTH BLACK/WHITE/CYAN
description: Lightness, comfort and adaptability reach the highest technological level in the AGV AX9.
